Summary: Look, I don’t understand why hotels still have rooms with double beds. Just put two queens in the room. There was space for that and then some. The room was very clean, but our AC unit leaked all over our floor. The property was clean and the staff was nice. There was not enough parking on our 2nd night so we had to park illegally on the property.   I liked the proximity to the ocean for the price. We might be back, but I’ll look for other hotels first.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to the beach. Your feedback about the bed type is noted and we will see what we can do about having some updates soon. We will also have someone look into the AC leak. We are glad you found the property clean and that our staff was able to provide you with good service. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Customer Care Team Motel 6 Newport Beach

Summary: We stayed one night after a night of partying on the town. This place was just right. The staff at this facility has been great, thanks “D”.  Super friendly and accommodating.  The rooms were Clean and Comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's a wonderful feeling knowing that our team was able to provide awesome service to you while you were staying with us. We are glad you found the room clean and that you had a comfortable stay. We hope that everything was in order and we look forward to having you back soon.  Best Regards,  Customer Care Team Motel 6 Newport Beach

Summary: We had a six day stay there recently.  From the beginning things went well with Rau the front desk manager being helpful.  The room was clean and the staff kept it nice during the entire stay.  It was a short drive to Newport Beach, Huntington Beach,Balboa and other beach locations.   The area around the hotel is nice with a great nature preserve a 15 minute walk away.  The local neighborhoods are beautiful with flowers everywhere.  Several good restaurants and bakeries with 5 minute walk.
Room tip: The enclosed area at the rear of property is quieter.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to the beaches. It's great that you were able to walk around the area to appreciate the flowers and the local establishments. We are glad our staff was able to provide you with good customer service and we hope that everything was in order. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Customer Care Team Motel 6 Newport Beach

Summary: I needed a cheap place to spend the night, and this was a cheap place to spend the night.  The parking wasn't very convenient and the spaces were unconscionably small, and the room was pretty spartan.  But it was clean and it did what I needed.  I wouldn't be averse to staying here again, but more likely I'd look around.  The staff people were very nice.
Room tip: I think you're better off getting rooms toward the front of the property.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's nice to hear back from you - we are glad that you found our rates to be reasonable and competitive. We are glad to hear that you found the room clean and that you were satisfied with the essentials. It's also nice that our staff was able to provide awesome customer service. We will see what we can do about having some updates in the near future. Thanks for saying that you will stay with us again - we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Customer Care Team Motel 6 Newport Beach

Summary Heading: Overall a great deal for newport beach.
Summary: I am happy enough and have stayed many times. If what you want is a clean room at an affordable price this is a good choice.  Good things: Rooms are very clean. Pool and hot tub look clean Most of the rooms aren't loud *but* you need to avoid a room toward the front. Food near by and delivery available  safe, expensive neighborhood  free parking. large bath tub. pet friendly/no pet feeds.  microwave/fridge free parking  Bad -the cleaning crew is great, but the front desk staff are very rude. I don't know what there deal is but it is annoying every time.  -Usually I have had quiet neighbors, but if you get loud ones you are in trouble as the walls are thin -rooms are pretty barren and there is only soup, no shampoo or conditioner or hairdryer. -sometimes there are shady guests
Room tip: If you ask for a room in the back the front staff ignores you, or they did me. So I would take...
Manager Response: Dear Amy,   Thank you for taking time to share your review with us. We love hearing from our guests and are happy you enjoyed your stay. We also appreciate your feedback regarding ways we can provide an even more comfortable stay for our guests. If you haven't already done so, please call our Guest Relations Department at 1-855-787-9864 to share your experience. We hope to see you again soon.   Safe Travels.

Summary: You are really in Costa Mesa. So what? It's clean and cheap, so why not stay here and avoid the high cost hotels of Newport Beach. Close to the 55 which is the main drag into Newport Beach and the Balboa peninsula.
Room tip: Get a room as far away from the front and that street traffic noise.

Summary: I helped a friend that just came home from the hospital check in for a few days at this Motel 6. It is conveniently located near the freeway. I was met by a very friendly and helpful front desk agent by the name of Liton. He was so helpful to accommodate me with a handicap room near the motel office as requested. The room was very clean, and perfect for a walker. The grounds were well kept and seemed very safe as well as accommodating to a short stay visitor. We were given a menu for a local pizza delivery service. The room had a refrigerator and microwave oven, as well as a walk-in shower that was very needed for my friend. Thank you Liton, your guest had a great experience.

Summary Heading: Clean and close to everything, but nothing special
Summary: The room was clean (priority #1), but it was your typical roadside no frills Motel 6. You pay for the address: Costa Mesa/Newport Beach. It is a short uber ride to Fashion Island or the beach, but other than sleeping, you won't want to really spend anytime hanging out at the motel.

Quite and clean place to stay, friendly staff, it has the basic amenities, the bed is ok, as it needs more Cushing. After sometime you can feel the mattress springs pushing, no breakfast provided during my stay.
Manager Response: Thanks  for  the  staying  with us  Looking  forward  to  serve  you  soon.

Summary Heading: Staff absent when hospitality was taught in hospitality management school
Summary: I just checked in to this hotel this afternoon, and I have to say that I can’t recall ever being treated more rudely while just trying to conduct a simple transaction.  I made my reservation through Expedia, so check in should have been fairly streamlined.  The guy at the front desk interrupted me a total of FIVE times while I was trying to check in!  Each time he did so, it was to bark orders, shouting for my ID, credit card, and license plate.  He even ridiculed my credit card, and insisted it wasn’t issued by a real bank, despite accepting it as payment.  My advice is to skip this place and try to find lodging where people are capable of professionalism.  It's a pretty low bar to merely expect people to be polite to you when you are giving them money, but this place still

I stayed here while on business. It was clean - yay! The corner room is not a good spot because it was a bit louder & the tv was at an odd angle from the bed. I did appreciate the mini fridge & the pool. I would recommend a second floor room. It was more than I had wanted to pay, but worth it because it was central to everything I needed!

Bottom line: I stayed there for one night 6/19/18. The room was satisfactory at this price point, but there was no hot water in the sink or shower and no assistance given after speaking with 2 different front desk associates.  After checking in at night I noticed there was no hot water in the sink. I was too tired to discuss this with the front desk and hoped there wouldn't be an issue with the shower the next morning.   The next morning at 7AM the issue remained the same in the sink and I found there was no hot water in the shower.  At around 7:15AM I was told by Rao at the front desk that no one could assist in fixing it until 9:30AM (I needed to check out prior to that).  At check-out at around 9AM I had to prove the issue to the new front desk attendant, Liton, by
Manager Response: Charck, Thank you for posting your review. We are sorry to hear about the inconveniences you experienced with the water temperature during your stay. We sincerely apologize for the unpleasant visit as a result of the discomfort you experienced. We invite you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your stay to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: We stayed here two nights. We had asked for a room at the back which was nice and quiet. At first we were shocked by the sparseness of the room, but we warmed up to it. It was freshly painted, had recently been cleaned with bleach (we could smell it) , and the lack of carpet makes it appear cleaner. However, the sparseness continued in a negative way as they don't include a blow dryer in the room. One has to call to see if there are any available, run down to the office to pick it up, use it, and return it right after use. I think they only had three of these. The bed was comfortable. We were awoken the second night at 3:42 by someone knocking on the door claiming to be delivering food. We called the front desk and they said they'd look into it. The motel does have a lot of

Our room had been recently renovated and was in great shape. Platform king bed with a firm mattress. Everything worked. Good free wifi (not free at some Motel 6s). Room at the back of the complex was very quiet even though the motel is right by the freeway. Some airplane noise from nearby John Wayne Airport. Ten minute drive to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank  you   for  staying  with  us.Your  business  great  mean  for  us. We   always   share reviews  with  our  our  all  stuffs to  deliver  better  service  towards  the  guest. Looking  forward  to   see  you  again  at  our  location. Thanks.   Mac.

Summary: As soon  as we opened the door it smelled moldy. The linoleum on the floor was warped horribly like maybe the room had flooded at some point. The bedspreads had multiple burn holes from cigarettes and numerous sewn patches. The check in staff was friendly.  I'm giving it 2 stars for being close to beach and catching the fairy to Catalina Island but I won't be back.
Manager Response: First  thank   you  for  staying  with  us. We  are  deeply  sorry  for  inconvenience  during  your  stay. Still  we  are   looking  for  serve  you   again. Please  call  us  &  we  will  make  rservation   for  your  need.  Thanks

Summary: Nicely located right off the freeway and a quick 10 minute drive to the beach and shopping is 5 minutes away. Rooms are reasonably priced and sized. We just needed a place to lay our heads not hang out and relax by the pool and this was it.

Stayed here for 1 night as were visiting family in Huntingdon Beach - check in was fine, although had to wait a while for the receptionist. Were upgraded to a room at the back of he hotel which i would suggest you go for, rather than being in one facing the main road. Room was huge, clean and modern with a powerful shower. Location is great, close to Huntingdon Beach and Newport Beach area - well worth the price paid.

Right on the main road into Newport Beach but you will need to drive to get near to the coast. That said there are a range of small restaurants within easy walking distance and the area is perfectly safe. Basic room with no frills but ok at the price. Plenty of parking and friendly service from the staff.

Well located near the highway 55,  Close to places for quick morning coffee, Big room, places to park the car on site, not far from Newport Beach, Quiet place.  Sometimes the front desk team to serious !

The two men at the desk were very accommodating.  The online reservation (made weeks in advance) was honored just as it was requested - first floor, handicap access, two beds.  No luxury here.  Just a basic, clean room that looked to be renovated not long before.  About a 30" TV, refrigerator, and microwave were in the room.  Pool is on the premises.  The a/c worked just fine.  Bed linens could have been much softer - maybe I'm super-sensitive but the scratchy sheets kept me awake!  This is an ok place for a short stay.

I recently stayed at Motel 6 Newport Beach and was pleased with the price and the condition of the room. It was clean, AC worked great with no annoying vibrations, squeaks or noises. I did however wish there had been an electrical plug in for the bathroom area. There was no plug in near a mirror for drying my hair. I did question the location and did not venture out after dark.

Fast easy check in. Decent sized room and spacious, big bathroom very sterile. Tv , Mini fridge, AC and micro worked. Nice clean pool. Great water pressure in shower. Wifi is absolutely terrible on cellphone lost connection way too often...needs upgrading, but great on laptop. Good phone service. Clean bedding and sheets, the mattress was pretty stiff but somewhat tolerable for a few days. Clean floors. Parking garage with extra parking available.
Manager Response: Thanks for  your  business  with  us. We  are   working  on   those  that  we  can  serve  you  better  in  future.

Summary Heading: Super clean, super quiet and really nice place.
Summary: BEST Motel 6 ever!  Mid week, last minute, no planning, great time.  They gave us a nice room back in the corner and away from all the action.  Loved it.  Marine layer, good sleep.  Dogs were fine and quiet.  REALLY great place.  Will stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Hello: Thank you   so  much   for  your business   with  us. It  was our  pleasure   to  serve  you. Your   feedback   to  help us  to  improve   better  service.  If  in future  looking  for lodging into  this  area . Please  let us have  a  chance  to  serve  you.  MOD.

Summary: Chose to stay here after a long day on the road. It wouldn't usually be our first choice, but we were pleasantly surprised (I also checked out the Ali Baba Motel next door first, that place was a dump!). We asked for a room on the top floor to avoid any upstairs neighbour noise. I was a little concerned that the noise from the freeway would be loud, but the clerk gave us a room right at the back of the hotel, and with the air conditioning on we couldn't hear the freeway at all. Others have complained about noisy air con, ours was fine. The room was clean and the beds and pillows comfortable. Oh, and it's right next door to a great pizza joint - Napa Valley Pizza.

We drove from Cleveland, OH to CA along Route 66/40. We stayed at a Motel 6 every stop along the way. Every one of them was updated. But, this one was our favorite. (Not on Route 66 - a relative lives nearby!). The gentleman at the desk said he'd upgrade us at no charge. Maybe that's why the room was bigger, the bathroom was bigger, there was a mini fridge and microwave, and there was a closet instead of a rack near the bathroom to hang things. Next time we visit our relatives, we're staying here again!

Summary Heading: NEVER   A G A I N
Summary: First night was fine.  2nd night roof leaked and they moved me to ground floor.   At 1AM the SMOKE ALARM went off and the fire bell just outside my door(no fire).   Continued off and on for one hour.  FINALLY GOT TO SLEEP ABOUT 3AM after calling front desk.   Desk person said a technician was coming.  Came back 3PM for a nap.....A G A I N the smoke alarm and fire bell!!!!    Went to desk and DEMANDED to be moved, which they did. They acted like.....why do you want to change room??  Of course, all I got was sorry about the fire alarm....NO discount or even comp night for 1 night of lost sleep.  Will NEVER stay at a Motel 6 again.   This low class treatment will make me MORE than willing to spend $125 as opposed to $82.......$82 should have been $49.95!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for posting your review. We are committed to delivering a clean, comfortable room and apologize for any failure in delivering on the commitment during your recent stay. Please know the maintenance conditions you experienced are an exception to our guest commitment and as such, we apologize. We invite you to contact our Guest Relations Department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: This is not a luxury hotel, but the management is the best we have found in several trips to California.  They cross Ts and dot Is and make sure the details are sorted out.  The rooms are somewhat spartan but all the essentials are there and everything is clean.  If you are looking for a place to stay this is the best deal around.

Face it, you don't get into a Chevy and expect a Limo., that being said, despite reading the reviews I tried to find major fault, and I can't. Yes there were some cosmetic issues, none health or safety related, Check in was quick and accommodating. Mo is very professional and polite. He went out of his way for me. The room does have a Fridge and Micro which worked perfect as did the heater. The free Wi Fi performed well. Safety was never an issue, I stayed for business, but may well be back for pleasure. There's a great pizza and pasta restaurant next door. Pool and hot tub area was exceptionally clean and inviting. I don't often say Motel 6 is my "always" choice, but this property is.   .

We had a terrible spending our night in this motel. We complained about the loud sound of their aircon once we turned it on. The sound can be heard in the entrance, that 's how loud it was!!! The manager was nice to check on it but he was not able to fix it and he said he will send the maintenance. The maintenance came in but he said he cannot do anything about it. We have to put it in fan mode so it will not sound too loud.  And they cannot transfer us to another room because he said they're fully booked. So we're not able to get a good rest!

We needed a spot to crash for one night near Huntington Beach. The hotel had availability and accepted the AAA discount so we went with it. However, the room smelled weird...like stale and cheap cleaning products. I would avoid staying here again if I could.
Manager Response: Buhrdy,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We strive to provide a clean, comfortable room and are disappointed your stay was unsatisfactory due to the odor concern and bed comfort issues you describe. Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you describe. We invite you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: This place was in an excellent location, clean room, and nice pool.  Vending machines with old candy.  No comfortable place to sit in the room, no towel racks or place to put anything during our 6 night stay.

Summary Heading: Only good for an overnight stay
Summary: An okay location, but motel reminded me of those dodgy hotels in horror movies with buzzing neon signs :). Reception were pleasant. Had free parking which was great. Had a laundry which was great although the vending machine for detergent stole your money! Managed to get one out of reception however. Neighbours had dogs in their room which for us Australians is alien. Fortunately we never heard them in the room. Another dude had this huge pit bull near the laundry. Made me rather uncomfortable.

Summary Heading: Beware! Would not recommend for family with kids
Summary: Booked a 2 night stay. The area is very sketchy. Upon entering the motel, there were a lot of guys sitting around the curb in front near the sign. Because they allow pets to stay here, the room smelled like cats, smoke. I would never understand why people would rate this motel 5/5. There were ants all over the floor, washroom. The sheets were disgusting and had a pee smell to it. We checked in fairly late, 11pm and was not able to move to another hotel. But as soon ad my little kids woke up at 7am, i was on the phone and cancelled our room. On our way back to our car, one of our luggage ran over dog poop. It was so gross.  Please do yourself a favor and spend an extra $20 to stay at a nicer hotel, specially if you have small kids. Never again.

Safe parking, clean upgraded rooms. Best Motel 6 we have ever stayed in. The location works for hitting the beach with a short drive and works well to head back towards Orange County. Easy to get in and out. Close to "the triangle" restaurants and movie theatre.

Me and my girls wanted to have a fun GNO so we booked a night here. First there is no carpet. Second, we wanted to hook up our laptop to the TV so we could watch Netflix & we werent able to. Beds were kind of scary. My friends bed had period blood on it or something! Seemed kind of sketchy. Only cool part was probably the elevated pool.

This hotel is very nice and clean. The staff were very friendly. It is a prime location to easily get to Huntington Beach as well as many great eateries. Room has been renovated and very nice, elegant touch to it. Rey glad I Picked here. If you are on the fence to stay here or not, just do it!!! You will NOT be disappointed.

Excellent! Rooms clean and no trace of smoke in non-smoking room. Quiet night sleep. The hotel is very strict about teenagers making racket in the hotel area. Also has many security cameras around the parking lot. The hotel is also easy to find! Overall a very good stay!

This motel was very safe and modern as well as quiet during our visit! We stayed here for 3 nights enjoying the hot tub on a cool February night. Short walks to the beach though I recommend the bus! As well as a nice restaurant next door with great pizza!

Summary Heading: great motel - easy drive to Huntington Beach
Summary: The room was really big and the beds were very comfortable! The TV had loads of channels to choose from. The room and motel halls, etc were clean. There was a lovely little swimming pool which we didn't expect. The man who checked us in and another who checked us out were very friendly and offered free coffee. With the motel situated just off the motorway, driving to Huntington or Newport Beach was easy. Really good motel - I'd highly recommend.

Summary Heading: RIP OFF ALERT charged for 2 rooms on 1 night stay
Summary: Beware booking online here. They are a straight out thiefs. I had reserved 1 room online and had 1 confirmation # for 1 guest When I checked in I was told I made 2 reservations. I explained to the clerk I only reserved 1 room an only needed 1 room for 1 person reservation. They charged for 1 room at 3pm when I checked in. They charged for the second room at 10pm said it was a no call no show fee. I reported to credit card company this fraud. This motel 6 fought this claim 3 times with my credit card company an won. I dont know how you can sleep at night stealing from people. I would not recommend staying here. You could be charged for additional rooms and charged as a NO SHOW? BUYER BEWARE online FRAUD.

Summary Heading: Throw your preconceived notion of Motel 6 aside...
Summary: Yeah, when I think of Motel 6, images of those Breaking Bad roadside hotels come to mind.    This was not it, to our pleasant surprise.   The accommodations were mostly new.  It seems that they probably remodeled the place not long ago.  The sleep was comfy, and it's fairly quiet.   The only negative is with the towels, which appeared to be somewhat unclean. Otherwise I would give it a 5, given it's good value for being one of the cheapest hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dionysus38,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We will look into your issue with the towels as we make cleanliness a priority here. Thank you again for the feedback.

Summary: This is a Motel 6, so don't expect breakfast, a hairdryer, etc.  However, it does provide a fridge, microwave and free wifi and many cable channels.  And it is 50% cheaper than anywhere else nearby and provides a clean quiet place to sleep.  Check in was easy and we ended up with a free upgrade to a bigger bed.  Good place to crash.
Manager Response: DVen8,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and hope to see you again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: The only thing good about this place is the room seem cleaned.  Only based on the fact they have new hardwood floors.   No hair dryers, drains for bath tub, rude workers, thin walls, etc.   Stay somewhere else!
Manager Response: Amanda V,  Thank you for writing us a review. We are sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay with us. Unfortunately, due to franchise standards we don't have hair dryers or drains for the bath tubs. I also apologize that you found our staff to be rude, but want to assure you that was not their intention.

Summary: Very simple, but everything you need to crash while spending a few days in the area. The room was clean and check in was a quick and pleasant experience. The motel is close to Starbucks and a variety of places to eat, not to mention close proximity to the beach. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Jeremy B,  Thanks for leaving us a review! We are glad to know you had a pleasant experience with us, and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I watched at the office that the manager was very rude to minority people! The employee treated the minority people no respect at all!!! Room was cleaned but smelly and room was not securely locked afterwards, which was a little concerning.  The night went on the next door and the hallway got louder and VERY much louder and went on well into the early hours of the morning.
Manager Response: aprilmay48,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. I'm sorry you felt that our manager was rude to minorities, but I want to assure you that we aim to treat all of our guests with respect. In fact, our manager, and most of our hotel staff, are minorities themselves. I still apologize, though, that you found him to be rude. We will also take note of your issue with your room and the late night noise, and will work to solve these issues to improve our guests' experience at our hotel.

Summary: If you're looking for a quick hotel that's clean in Costamesa /Newport area this is good.  The staff was very nice and helpful  Fixing my reservation for me which had the wrong bed size.  The parking is free and convenient, free wifi, pool, laundry facility's  Convenient location.  Would stay here again
Manager Response: Tennisfamily808,  Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We would love to have you back again!

Summary: Close to the beach. Clean, upgraded with laminate floors (glad not to have carpeting!) Even though it is close to the freeway, the rooms are back far enough not to have any street noise! There is a nice cozy Italian restaurant next door. For the price it was pretty nice!
Manager Response: Stephanie S,   Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: It is what it is... a $75 motel close to Newport Beach. The room was what I expected; laminate floors, small (but clean) bathroom, lots of nearby takeout and delivery food, and of course the BEACH is just a little ways away. When I stayed here I didn't spend much time in the room because there was so much to do in the area. But the way that the parking is set up, it fills up pretty quick especially on a the weekends in the evening and it is difficult to find a spot to park. You will have an easier time trying to park in the morning and early afternoon, and the lot is kind of cramped too. I did get free coffee in the lobby though, and they have elevators if you don't like all the stairs. It did seem like there were quite a few people out and about in the motel and hanging out
Manager Response: PDXtrent,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and our service, and hope to see you again next time you're in Southern California!

Summary: We always use mitel 6 no matter where we go. I love the ease of reserving online and if we have to change dates customer service is always friendly and empathic. We are going to ventura in a week and I have no worrys because motel 6 is known well for clean and comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Creeds_gem,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and hope to see you again soon! Safe travels!

Summary: Oh my goodness, this hotel would be a 4 star hotel if it had a restaurant which is outstanding star rating according to AAA. I have been in the hotel business for over 25 years. I've consulted for marketing for 2 to 5 star hotels to get them the most business for the money people pay. This hotel is right up there with the quality I expect of my hotels. I do the black light test everywhere I stay. I was very impressed, not one mark except for the TV remote and the phone. To management, just have housekeeping wipe that with their cleaning towel every time they clean the room and that will do the trick. The outside is what you would expect at any motor lodge classic/vintage properties. The upkeep is outstanding, new landscaping, very clean paint job throughout. The room, the design
Manager Response: Kristian A,  Thank you for the awesome review! We are glad to hear that a professional like yourself truly enjoyed your stay with us. Come back soon, we'd love to have you again!

Summary: I was very busy moving out of my home less than a week prior to Christmas in order to have my wood floors refinished. I needed something close to home and that allowed pets. I booked this hotel sight unseen based upon photos and high favorable reviews on both tripadvisor and Expedia.com. Upon check-in the desk personnel were initially very dismissive/unresponsive. The maid was still in the room, it smelled of bug spray, but was clean aside from the hairs I saw on the mattress cover underneath the fitted sheet. The room was barely bigger than the full size bed. There were sketchy people both in the parking structure and in front of the hotel. My 3rd night there I was awakened by the smell of marijuana smoke. When I reported it to the desk clerk, I was told I could check out right
Manager Response: Michele M,  Thank you for taking the time to review. We are sorry to hear that your stay was less than pleasant. While we cannot change your experience at our hotel, we will use your review to improve our staff and hotel as a whole. I want to assure you that this is not the way our hotel normally operates, and these issues have been addressed to each member of the staff. Again, thank you for your review.

Summary: My mom and I stayed at this hotel based on the good reviews on TripAdvisor and we were not disappointed. The room was large, very clean, updated and in the back away from the street. I loved the hardwood floors instead of old nasty carpet; I wasn't afraid to walk barefoot for a change. There was even enough space to do my morning yoga routine. It may be a bit more minimalistic than other budget motels but having a working micro and fridge is a plus. No breakfast but that's ok because there's plenty of other amazing places around to stop for a quick bite.  It's in Newport Beach so the parking lot is small and being New Year's eve totally full so some people didn't have a spot. Service was good, the clerk was busy but moved everyone along quickly. There was one issue with the
Manager Response: Rana S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us over New Year's. We would love to see you back here again!

Summary Heading: great hotel, very modern and well kept. friendly staff and very happy with service.
Summary: Hotel was very reasonable for price, the staff were all friendly and the rooms were modern and very clean. Don't expect beach views and bell hops and you won't be disappointed.  I got to Newport Beach in about 10mins drive and there was a grocery store about 5 min walk away, they have ice and vending machines next to the rooms. parking was very good, I stopped on a Wednesday night and went out for a bit, had no problem parking when I got back. Definely would stop again.
Manager Response: Matthew H,  Thank you for the great review! We are very glad to hear that your stay was convenient and enjoyable. We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary: Room was clean, quite basic and does not feel homely but was perfect for what we were looking for. If you are looking for luxury then this is not suitable. Secure free parking facilities, we did not use the pool so cannot comment on that aspect. Well placed for exploring costa mesa and newport beach area.
Manager Response: Louise H,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. It is important to us that all of our guests are more than satisfied with their stay here, and we will continuously work towards improving the hotel with the help of your review.

Summary: Like most Motel 6 properties, this one has been remodeled and is very neat, clean and sporty, if certainly spartan and simple.  Everything was in great working order, the pool area was nice and, like all Motel 6 properties, they allow pets for free.  It's in a pretty good location, not far from key area attractions.

Summary Heading: Terrrible!! Dirty rooms! Expensive for no reason!!
Summary: Terrible! I paid over $189 plus $25 key which they didnt return at check out! The room was dirty had bugs in the room found bugs in the bed, the office staff was rude and wouldnt change the room after a complaint the night manager didnt stop people from knock on my door at strange hours, i was bugged for drugs 3 times and i had my kids with me. i thought i heard gun fire 6 times. we were going to stay for a week but decided to leave and go somewheres else this is the worst motel 6 ever i will never come here again!!

Summary Heading: Surprised in both good and bad ways
Summary: Surprised at how big the room was. Surprised that they had NO shampoo or conditioner. Surprised that the floors are all laminate with no carpet. Surprised that there is no hairdryer in any rooms.  I do appreciate that the service people are exceptionally good at keeping on top of guests needs.  They did deliver a hairdryer for me to use and then made a followup call to make sure I was happy with it.  The motel is in a good area for restaurants and just 4 miles to the beach.  Get some shampoo, conditioner and hairdryers and I'd be happy to visit again.

One of the worst motel I've ever been to.. I was ready to relax from a long day when I layer on bed I smelled something funky and thought it was just the blanket but comes out to be that there was piss on the bed, went to go to tell receptionist. And the receptionist was doing the best he could. But when the manager came around he started raising his voice not only to us but his employee. He blamed US for the pee. Horrible horrible experience. I wouldn't recommend it. You might sleep in pee and they won't tell you
Manager Response: Valerie,          Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We strive to provide a clean, comfortable room and are disappointed your stay was unsatisfactory due to the odor concern and bed comfort issues you describe. Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you describe. We invite you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: Had stayed here several times in the past. On this date was for the OC fair. The room was $145.00.  However it was Saturday, and middle of Summer, in a primo-resort location. The room was large, in the back #311. all re-done. Faux wood floors, raised sink in bathroom, accent lighting. Nothing at all wrong with the place. The only thing I did not like was the inflated price.

Summary Heading: A cut above the usual Motel 6 hotel
Summary: The rooms are,such more spacious than other Motel 6 hotels - updated, good beds, etc. However, if you have any special needs make sure you call several times before and ask them to tell YOU what they have reserved for you.  I had confirmed a wheelchair accessible room, gone 2 days ahead to preview it, was told it was all ready for us AND guess what?  Upon arrival to move into my prepaid w/chair accessible room, they had given it away!  The other rooms had no access for a wh/chair and they didn't even have a shower chair to put in the tub.  The bathrooms were too small for a wheelchair to fit into, and although they put an plastic poolside chair in the  tub, there was no way to transfer into it.  MAKE SURE YOU CONSTANTLY MONITOR YOUR SPECIAL RESERVATION.  Also, I had made this

Summary: Rooms were clean, smelled good. Large tub. Clean parking area. They had doggie poop bags available for people that had brought their dogs. Silent air conditioner. Comfortable king size bed. WII and TV worked great..

The room was good, nicely remodeled like all other Motel 6. I stayed here with friends about 6 months ago and would definitely go back! Although the location is a little weird, it was close enough to the beach!

Summary Heading: Motel 6 is the Ritz for the budget minded...free perks and same day cancel policy
Summary: Motel 6 has left the light on for us and whaddya know this ain't the room that's a dud but it's only $19.99 of the past.....now it's a new fab Euro-inspired furnished and fixtured, including hardwood  flooring and crisp duvet cover on a comfy king size bed for $89 (a bargain in the area for weekend) located just minutes from Newport Beach.  We were seriously surprised how great the room is.  The front desk staffer super friendly (gone is the grumpy chain smoking keeper of the keys clerk of years past). Motel 6 has very customer friendly perks including:  *Free Wi-Fi *Pets are FREE and welcome *Free cable with premium channels *Free parking (larger hotels in area charging $30+ night  *ability to cancel reservation until 6pm day of check-in! (Everyone else charges one day for less

The parking is to small the attention on the Custumers is too poor and the location on this hotel is noisy a lot. The personal client the room sometime left the room not completely clean. In term the security is complete non only On night and sometime are see.

Guess I haven't been to a Motel 6 in a while or this one just wowed me based on past, very past experiences.  I booked this hotel for one night in order not to drive home after an all day concert in Newport Beach.  I called before heading to the concert and was assured my room would be waiting for me whenever I got there - and it was.  The location is great in terms of shopping, hotels and restaurants. Our room was on the third floor (over the underground garage).  While the furnishings were minimalistic, there was slight Miami Beach feel due to the art deco touches.  To my surprise the carpet was gone (thank you J****) and replaced with wood-like laminate.  A king bed with two side tables (no dresser), a central table with 2 chairs and a television mounted on the wall completed

Decent location and price.  Room was nice size and clean.  Fridge and nice flat screen with decent selection.  Great laundry room facilities.  Mattress was on the hard side and was a bit uncomfortable.  Also, water coming out of the tap was foul smelling and tasting-bring your own bottled water.   Only coffee service in the AM.  Wall are not sound proof so expect not to sleep before midnight. Overall, the clean room and the price made up for the shortfalls.

I think its fairly safe because of all the cameras I saw from the inside lobby, but the people looked sketchy. I never wanted  to be by the pool to hang out and just lay around. I was never there during the day on purpose. I slept there  and took  a shower and left for the day.

Summary Heading: a good location close to Newport and Huntington Beaches
Summary: the rooms are clean and I love the wood floors- coming in with sandy feet from the beach. If you can get a good deal on the room, it's a great value. Ask at the front desk to borrow a hair dryer. The room does not have the extras like shampoo, condition or lotion but it's clean in a good location. It's not a hotel I would hang out at much because of the lack of amenities but it's a basic, clean place. I spend most of the time on the go anyway. The beds can be small- like a double bed, so ask about that. The front desk staff is friendly and helpful.

I booked a non smoking room but due to a snafu with my credit card (not Motel 6 fault) the card could not be charged. I called ahead to let them know I would pay with another card upon arrival ASAP.  When I arrived they told me they had cancelled the reservation but they found me another room (for which I was grateful). However, upon entering the room, I gagged at the overwhelming stink of stale cigarette smoke. My parents were smokers so I grew up in a heavy smoke environment. I was in Vegas recently (perhaps the last place where public indoor smoking is accepted) and this room was much worse than even the smokiest casinos. I turned on the A/C, opened the door and windows and tried to air the room out but it didn't help much.  I had no choice but to sleep in the room (I was on
